website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy bench that looks good anywhere in the house.
pros: The MDF design provides stability to this oak veneer bench
This is a heavy, solidly constructed bench that seats three comfortably
Measures 60 inches wide by 14 inches deep by 18 inches high
cons: The oak veneer is more reddish than brown

website_summaries.verdict: Vintage looks with solid construction is what this dining bench delivers. Best for older-looking tables and dining room sets.
pros: A great finish purposefully distressed for a much older look
Will fit in well with any rustic or traditional interior design style
cons: Hard surface is less comfortable to sit on for long periods

customer_reviews.title: Tough love!
customer_reviews.text: lord have mercy. The table is a beauty but is very difficult to piece together. It took me a smooth 3 hours. I wouldn’t have bought it if I had known with certainty that I would be sitting on the floor frustrated and tired and building a table. It shouldn’t be this difficult. Again, the table is beautiful and and well made. However you can find something at a furniture store for a similar price and less drama!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The chairs and bench are pretty simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: OK. There are four packages, one with the bench. Two boxes with two chairs each and then the table. The chairs and bench are pretty simple to put together, I did need to make sure I had the right leverage for some of the screws but not an issue. The table is a beast. Yes. But it's also a very well designed table and totally worth the effort. Everything is very sturdy, we're thrilled with the quality of the wood and so excited to have some friends over to feed on it! I attached plenty of pictures so I hope they are helpful
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Great quality not a good color
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, it's so sturdy and heavy duty! I'm only giving it a 4 star because the coloring is awful. It is way more red than it shows on the picture online. And it completely clashes with my table. I'm super bummed about it, it looks that bad. If it had more wood grain dark streaks and they had toned down the red a bit it would look a lot better. It just looks like it was painted a solid red. Super unfortunate. Now that it's all put together I don't even want to waste my time trying to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lulubabyface

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench for Anywhere in the Home
customer_reviews.text: Solid and beautiful bench. Bought for my dining room table but like it so much as a "window seat" I'll have to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench overall, don't like the scratch marks
customer_reviews.text: I originally found another bench on Amazon, but it's now unavailable and it's 3 times the price from other sellers. So I settled on this bench after a lot of searching. It's a pretty nice piece overall, it took my husband less than 10 minutes to put together. You can't see them in the picture, but the company added fake "wear and tear" marks to the bench to give it a rustic or weathered feel...it looks really fake. That would have to be my only real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to work
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table! It took my husband and son 4 hours to put it together, they ran across no problems...except time and LOTS of pieces. My husband is mechanically inclined and he didn't need to use any extra gadgets from his shop. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bordner

customer_reviews.title: The assembling process is not easy. I almost gave up in the process
customer_reviews.text: The assembling process is not easy. I almost gave up in the process. The whole process took a lot of energy and time. And you must have good tools (screw drivers) and extra glue. The overall quality is good after I finished it. The instruction is generally clear, but there are some minor errors in it.
customer_reviews.author: JeffW

customer_reviews.title: You’ll build this table, so be ready to work
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, this isn’t an “out of the box” ready table. You’re going to build it. You’d better give yourself at least 3-4 hours, and if you’re doing it alone, good luck with the cross-bar base. They provide 64 dowels, each needing glue on both sides, but provide glue in a tube the size of my index finger that lasted for 10 dowels. It uses two separate sized bolts each with different size hex wrench sizes but they included two hex wrenches the same size. The end result was ok, but the breadboard ends are loose even thought the parts are where they belong. As long as you’re somewhat handy, good luck. If you’re not handy, buy another table.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty B

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great solid bench for the money. Uses Allen heads in the electric screwdriver and put it together in less than 1/2 an hour. Matched my table perfect. Delivery was crazy fast! The “distressing” is a little cheesy but I have kids so I’m sure we will add our own distressing so it doesn’t bother me for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were fine when I got them, didn't match my table like I was hoping but that is not a flaw in the chair. However, after having them for several months they are chipping everywhere and constantly need re tightening. We are only 2 adults and 1 teenager, not excessive use. I am already looking for other chairs. It is much more cost effective to spend the extra money on SOLID WOOD chairs instead of whatever these are. I had solid oak chairs that came with my table for almost 30 years....they were just getting a little rickety though so thought I'd replace them. These were a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but don’t like ends of table
customer_reviews.text: Table came packaged well in a box. Pieces were labeled well. It takes quite awhile to assemble but not difficult. Table is very sturdy. The leaves are sturdy as well. The distress marks are very uniform .. not natural looking. I do not like that you can’t put a chair on the end without the leaves on because of how close the legs are to the end. Also I do not like how the you can see the latch on the end with the leaf off. Overall I like the table but could use a few changes.
customer_reviews.author: anonomys

customer_reviews.title: wrong placement of legs and supporting bottom frame rendered this item useless. after working on it for good hour trying ...
customer_reviews.text: wrong schematic at the bottom, wrong placement of legs and supporting bottom frame rendered this item useless. after working on it for good hour trying to figure out thinking maybe I am missing something, I ask two other handymen and they both laughed saying this was manufactured or put together wrong! Maybe it was just mine but this was unworkable.
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: The fake "antiquing" makes them look really cheap.
customer_reviews.text: They dented the wood in a couple of places with the same exact pattern so you immediately know it's fake aging. The chairs themselves look pretty good, and they are reasonably comfortable. But then they ruined them with the cheezy denting pattern. I missed the return window so I'm stuck with them until the next time big brothers/big sisters is in my area. I wouldn't recommend them, they look like they came from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Libera Vivas

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly... but..
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Rustic Dirty Oak chairs. Assembly took 30 minutes. Chairs are sturdy and comfortable. Only thing is that the distressing is machine stamped into the wood in basically the same locations. It's ok I guess. I told my wifw I could take a chain and hammer to it to make it more authentic, but she said NO.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdog2962

customer_reviews.title: Great hefty bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great hefty bench for the price. Matches my dining table perfectly and has opened up more space in my tight dining room. There are these odd marks in random places on the bench to give the illusion of a destructed look that in my opinion are not executed well. Not complaining for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself, and it was not difficult. It is a nice weight and is made well. The only thing I would suggest differently in the assembly is to add wood glue to the dowels, especially the crossbars. You need to leave the leg screws loose so that you can fit in the crossbars and then tighten after installing the crossbars.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPBFL

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This bench occupies a long space against the wall of our newly-finished basement. The space was too narrow overall for a larger piece of furniture, but it still looked empty; something was definitely needed in order to pull the room together. This bench did the trick. We hung some artwork on the wall, and now the space looks great. Bench is very sturdy, and the color and design are beautiful. It looks a lot more expensive that it is, and it almost makes the space look like something out of an art gallery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted to purchase a similar item from Ikea; however, they do not ship and the nearest store carrying the piece is in Phoenix, like, 13 hours away. Not happening. I found this on Amazon and it arrived a couple days later. There were a few extra screws and bolts, which made me a little nervous, but I am delighted with how sturdy and attractive it is! Very glad I didn't get the Ikea one lol ...
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy and was fairly easy to assemble. The instructions said not to use a drill but I'm not sure that’s possible because this is solid wood. In my opinion it would take a much longer without a drill. All things considered, we love our new table and we are on it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Shamuel

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The WE Dark Oak Dining Bench was easy to put together with simple but comprehensive instructions. It's design is so nice. It's solid and works just right in our dining room so three of my kids can sit on one side of the table. It's very pretty and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mom

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this table
customer_reviews.text: Well made and well designed. The table looks great. it takes considerable time to assemble and it’s a bit easy to make mistakes, but I’m quite satisfied. Be aware that the box is huge and extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ttb music

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table...with the 2 end leaves, can easily seat 10 people which has come in handy for holidays!!! Very sturdy, solid wood construction; easy to care for. Table was available thru other furniture vendors, but was able to purchase thru Amazon ALOT cheaper! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy White

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: The table was packaged wonderfully, however the table scratches very easily. We had it sitting on hardwood floor during assembly (with nothing else on the surrounding floor) and found several scratches once turning it on to its side. We’ll use furniture markers so it’s not the end of the world, but something to be aware of. Assembly took around 2.5 hours for us. I’ll try and include some pics later for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: We were a little hesitant to purchase furniture online and without seeing it in person first but we are so happy with this bench. It was pretty easy to put together and it's very sturdy and great quality. We are very happy that we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench, great quality at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with how this turned out. For the price, this makes a great bed bench. Once built, it is solid and heavy and will support pretty much support whatever you put on it. The two little decorative knobs between the legs fall off easy, and that was remedied with some Elmer's wood glue. If you've put together furniture before, this shouldn't be that difficult to assemble. The included picture shows this bench against a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoGeek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful..table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table... The reason for the 4 stars was 2 things.. One.. The Table was very time consuming to put together... Very happy I had a drill. A right angle attachment for said drill.. One various bits and screwdrivers for this table... And still took 3 hours give or take 15 min... Not for a novice... And two it scratches very easily.. But looks beautiful...
customer_reviews.author: Acidspring13

customer_reviews.title: We have room at our table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set with a unique finish. It has been the perfect dining set for our family of six and at a great price. The extensions are great for family gatherings and invites even more loved ones to sit around the table which we absolutely love. With the extra chairs we have on hand we fit 12 people comfortably. While assembling, it took about an hour for the table, an hour for the bench, and an hour for the four chairs. So a little over three hours all together. I would recommend having your own wood glue on hand, there is not enough glue provided. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: This bench is great. It's very heavy and substantial
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great. It's very heavy and substantial. Fits 3 kids or 2 adults side-to-side comfortably, and is wide enough for adults to sit on without falling off the back. Easy to put together. It's a warm dark brown with black accents to give it a "worn" look. The accents are obviously machine-made if you look up close, but look good from afar. Overall, a great bench for extra seating at my table, that I won't be afraid kids will push back and fall off of or break.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Varsanik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Could never put together our selves. When you see all the screws, etc. you will agree! Have the v helpful Pro do it for you. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs.
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought these a long time ago. I wanted to wait to review. That way I could see how they hold up. So, having bought them a LONG time ago, they are still like new and have held up to a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy bench. It was easy to put together. It is very plain - it has some "distressed" markings that I am not crazy about, but it serves my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: tinydancer59

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: WE purchased this for our new home and we love it. Like many other reviewers had mentioned, it was a beast to assemble. It took my husband one night to assemble the chairs and bench, and a night and a half to assemble the table. But... it is sturdy and well made solid wood so we aren't complaining! It is just as described online and everyone who sees it, comments how nice and great it is. Thankful we finally just pulled the trigger and ordered it! (it sat in my shopping cart for a while :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The table looks excellent and is sturdy. Is was a pain to put together. Like they were in a national contest of how many tiny pieces can be shipped in one box; however it was worth it in the end. I have sore knees and back but I love my new table.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is a real workhorse! Very sturdy, and heavy solid wood. I just love it. I utilize it for my desk and at 92" it is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: L. in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful, well made, all parts came, & the extensions are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love how the table looks, foremost. It is pretty wood and distressed and dark around the ROUNDED edges. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreadsky

customer_reviews.title: Great price, very solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Great price, very solid piece. Was difficult to assemble and very time consuming, but to be fair this exact set would likely be double the price in store fully assembled. Most of the directions were straight forward, but we did notice that some of the diagrams did not match the text. Not a huge fan of the fake looking "rustic" accents, but really overall a nice looking table and chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Troop

customer_reviews.title: Color is TOTALLY off
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. The color is horrid and not at all like the picture. They are RED. Orangey...RED. There is also some distressing that is literally the worst of its kind. It looks terrible. What a waste. Thankfully I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs. Much more red then shown in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs. Much more red then shown in the photo. says dark oak, lighter than what is shown. The chairs are very strong and sturdy and they are wide which I like, more spacious. The only other drawback is the markings, they look very fake and not natural at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect bench for our table. Absolutely love it! I do agree with other comments that the color of the wood has a more reddish hue than the picture represents, but it worked well for us anyway. I would purchase it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: Color is much redder in person. Overall very nice quality, and a sheepskin thrown over the bench takes care of the color problem.
customer_reviews.author: Abby D

customer_reviews.title: It looks like in the picture and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bench for about 4 months now and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: dining room set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dining set for my daughter's new home ....she just loved it ...it is a very nice looking set. It is sturdy and was much nicer than I thought it would be ...actually she picked it out and I was a little apprehensive ...I thought it may be on the fragile side but it is well constructed. She was well pleased with it and it looks very nice in her dining room ....I would recommend this item for anyone who wants a simple and not ornate dining room .
customer_reviews.author: ann m

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, clear instructions! This was 2nd set I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Kenny C

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality and the only tool needs besides what they give you is a phillips screwdriver. The instructions were great and easy to follow with images.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Van Utrecht

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Straight from the Factory, Scratches and Assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible from the multiple photos you can see it came with many scratches from the factory. but the final photo shows that they drilled the holes on the wrong side on two of the bench legs I can't even put this together properly. Stay away away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of this table being a pain to assemble but how much the reviewers loved the table. They were correct but I had several people available to help with assembly so we got it done in a couple hours. The table is great looking, sturdy, and is perfect for large or small family dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: we ordered two sets of these and the matching bench for our custom made dining room table. SO happy with these. they took a little time to put together but absolutely worth it. match perfectly with beautiful accents and nice heavy feel but easy to move. would buy them again if needed
customer_reviews.author: kmess16

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was a darker stain than portrayed. And a few dents here and there doesn’t make rustic farmhouse to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lonna Possehl

customer_reviews.title: Better photo of product
customer_reviews.text: While these benches are good quality!! The colour was completely off from the phot in Amazon!!! They are not a warm brown they are actually very very red!!! I wondered if they sent the wrong colour but they only had one colour available .... so the colour was misrepresented in the ad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench for the money
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly by our ping pong table for the kids to sit on while they wait their turn. Took about an hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful! Rustic, just like the pictures show. Lots of character. Unfortunately the color didn’t match my table ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table! Very easy assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Table ! Very easy assembly instructions. Time consuming to assemble. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous about it looking very cheap since most boxed furniture now days has horrible quality. Package was missing instructio
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous......people compliment it every time we throw a dinner party. Was nervous about it looking very cheap since most boxed furniture now days has horrible quality. Package was missing instructions but it wasn't rocket science so had it assembled in half an hour. Have used it now at dining room table for almost a year now and it's held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Fix it Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, happy
customer_reviews.text: Yes there are fake distress marks, but these are still very nice, durable benches and we love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Item is much nicer than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Item is a redish-brown rather than brown, but is very nice looking. Item is well made, directions are easy to follow. I was able to put item together with a little help from my husband. Suggest that part number 6 be glued into place.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Marchi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting at least some manufactured wood but this table is all solid wood!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Kharitonov

customer_reviews.title: Black mark on surface on purpose???
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what they were trying to accomplish with a huge black mark on the surface but it looks horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are nice wood, but they are more of a reddish ...
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are nice wood, but they are more of a reddish tone than the brown they look in the pictures. The distress marks do not look very genuine in person; painted on rather than worn.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Carney

customer_reviews.title: Lots of work, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, strong table! Just be careful not to overtighten screws as they will poke through the wood. I think this will last my rough-and-tumble family of boys a long time. It took my husband a long time to put together with a little help from me. (I was the one who overtightened the screws.) Once together, it really is a beautiful table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Solid. Could have left off the cheesy "antique" marks, not to many of them. Color was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Groom Lake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy benches
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, the "wear marks" were a little more pronounced then I expected, and highlighted with black. Over all though I like the look of the benches I bought. Also they were very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: J. hogle

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how sturdy they were
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my benches-I ordered two for my dining room table. They allow my entire family to better fit at our rectory table (it has a trestle on the bottom which made it difficult for two chairs to fit comfortably at the table) and really, better enjoy our table at all times. They were easy to put together, they have suffered a couple of dings and scratches (I have 3 children, two boys who are hard on everything and a dog who likes to drag antlers across everything) already, but honestly, I really don't care. What I paid for them, if I can get 6 or 7 years worth of use out of them, because they're sturdy-I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 36 year old son and his family. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Assemby Hard
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to assemble. Table is easily gets scratched. Looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value for the money. Assembly was not difficult and it was just right for where I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, great for what I need. But I’m disappointed on the color variances, both ordered and dark oak color.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Little tough to assemble not for someone who had never put things togethet
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Color is not what is shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: The color is much more cherry than this photo shows. Does not match any of my wooden, distressed furniture and will be returning. Very misleading photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Ordered it as a gift and well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not what's shown .. much MUCH brighter in person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of solid wood in the house
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of solid wood in the house. Perfectly fits for my dining table. I bought them separately but it looks great
customer_reviews.author: O***

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: The table came scratched and did not provide enough glue. Overall, fair table for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Very solid. Make sure you have a power screwdriver fully charged though. Mine died 5 minutes in. Boy was that a mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy, and exactly as describe. SO HAPPY with this one.
customer_reviews.author: kmess16

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love his. Hold three adults with no problem, and looks amazing. I get a lot of compliments. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Call
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts call me. Please assist with getting my missing parts for my recent Amazon purchase of the dining room bench. Thank you. Kathy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy De Lasaux

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: none of the screws fir properly into holes. The screws that fit were too long & put a hole through the seat. I had to return two orders.
customer_reviews.author: tcm716

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow so nice to see such a sturdy solid bench seat. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy duty bench construction. Good red tone stain color. Mfg's scratch marks look fake. Prefer not to have it. Strong VOC.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great table!!!!! Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected!!!! Very sturdy and love the color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tbec13

customer_reviews.title: Caution....they are darker.
customer_reviews.text: when we received them, they were much darker than described...but because we needed them for a weekend family event, we assembled them and kept them around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the color that I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered brown oak, and the color I got was a mahogany, didn’t match my table, I’m keeping it because I need it for thanksgiving
customer_reviews.author: Merikay V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice beautiful solid chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great , Nice , Solid , easy to assemble , exactly what is advertise . Perfect ...
customer_reviews.author: D.cox

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Dining Set, solid wood. Very solid wood, heavy. The assembly is the hardest I've experienced in years. Would I buy it again. YES! But would have a more help.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very solid after assembly. Nice chairs at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, but INCREDIBLY DIFFICULT to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love the table, but even a professional carpenter had a difficult time putting it together. He HAD to use power tools, including a drill insert that can bend and twist, since assembly required drilling at an impossible angle. I would recommend the table, but only if you have a LOT of patience. I really wish amazon would have an assembly service, or at least that the table was at least partially assembled when shipped. Nice quality wood though, and nice finish. Arduous process, but a satisfying result.
customer_reviews.author: Jessamyn Vedro

customer_reviews.title: a narrow, but sturdy coffee table.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted...a narrow, but sturdy coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!! It's absolutely stunning! It was difficult to put together but that makes it sturdy! I love the leaves you can take out or leave in depending on what size table you need! Would definitely but again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece for the price....matched my table and seems to be wearing well
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chouinard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sturdy bench that looks beautiful in my entryway. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is really good and the leaves are very easy to attach or remove.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna L.

customer_reviews.title: Not correct color description
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bench but the color absolutely was not dark wood. This is more of a reddish color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable seating made with quality wood.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and seats up to three in a pinch. Good looking addition to my dining area. Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol  T.

customer_reviews.title: it did match like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together and it does not match. now I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Totherow

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bench to go with an old Farm Table. It works perfectly. It's very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality..........perfect addition to our dining set.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bench seat for our dining room table! So much so that we ordered another one to go on the other side. Very easy assembly and great quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ConnerSheehan

customer_reviews.title: Very good wood and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected! Very good wood and sturdy. Easy to put together. Definitely a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing chair legs
customer_reviews.text: I am missing a set of chair legs. And, I am not repackaging all of this... If I can get a set of chair legs, I will be happy to give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: katherine quilty

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, 2 of the chair parts were for the wrong side of the chair. Those pieces have to be installed wrong-side-up exposing the screw heads. This is a problem with the supplier including too many cross braces for one side of the chair and not enough of the other.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bench! Exceeded my expectations. My husband put it together in 15 mins without the instructions. Great quality! Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Rustic Farmhouse Wood Distressed Dining Room Kitchen Bench, Brown Oak
product_meta.description: Style Name:BenchPerfect for any room in your home, this indoor wood bench provides additional seating for whatever occasion. Crafted from high-quality MDF and a gorgeous real wood veneer finish, this distressed wood bench is both sturdy and stylish. Transitional in design by having simple lines throughout the piece, it gives a warm, rustic farmhouse feel to a space. Ideal as a place to sit and put on or take off your shoes or put your purse and bag down on, set it in your entryway or mudroom for easy access when you leave and arrive home. Enjoy it as a standalone piece in your home’s entrance or with one of our matching dining table and chairs in your dining place for extra room.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 18" H x 60" L x 14" W
Pair with matching dining table for a complete set
Made of solid Wood Veneer and High-Grade MDF
